title: Renovated Historic Duplex with Tech-Forward Spirit in Pila's Suburb
description: Experience the perfect blend of historic charm and modern comfort in this beautifully renovated duplex in Pila's tranquil Suburb neighborhood. This spacious residence offers 4 bright bedrooms and 2 stylish bathrooms spread over 148 sqm of thoughtfully arranged living space. Enjoy newly refreshed interiors—all while benefiting from dedicated work-from-home areas ideal for digital nomads. Outside, savor meals al fresco in your private, fenced yard or entertain under the stars.
neighborhood_description: Set within Pila's Suburb, this area embraces a quietly progressive, tech-focused energy while boasting easy highway access. With excellent schools and the comfort of a peaceful, mostly residential environment, the neighborhood offers the space to thrive—perfect for families who need convenience as well as digital professionals seeking quiet productivity. Nearby local grocery stores, cafes, and green spaces add to quality of daily life.
lifestyle_benefits: safe and private yard for relaxation or pets
seamless highway connection for easy travel
target_buyer: Ambitious digital nomads and tech professionals desiring an inspiring mix of heritage charm, modern comfort, and access to both strategic commuter routes and tranquil surroundings.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity to secure a fully renovated, tech-friendly historic duplex in a low-urban, family-oriented district of Pila; distinguishes itself through modern amenities blended with classic architecture, tailor-made for those seeking unique character and flexibility for work-life balance.
